lyrics_features.cleaned_text: The lights exploded She stood burning in front of me She ripped my heart out and gave it to me My eyes wouldn't open, cemented to her face Have I begun a feeble chase? I'll be down, I'll be around I'll be hanging where eventually you'll have to be I'll just stare and hope you'll care It's only everything standing in front of me I know what you did to me I know what you did was wrong You're allowed to torture me Wait a moment until I'm gone I know you're the ticket, you gotta be 'Cause I let you be alone for long Got to be so completely Got to be so I can't hang on I'll be down, I'll be around I'll be hanging where eventually you'll have to be I'll just stare and hope you'll care It's only everything standing in front of me I'll be down, I'll be around I'll be hanging where eventually you'll have to be They're not there, you're standing there Now you'll have to decide the fate of my sanity
